welcome.confirmed_booking: Your booking is confirmed for these dates. Please have a look through the guidebook, where you'll find key information and our AI assistant. During your stay, this page will also let you see and control your room's heating and lighting.
welcome.during_stay: Welcome to our guidebook, where you can find information, chat with our AI assistant, and see and control your room's heating and lighting.

ha_dashboard.light_unavailable: Power is off at the wall switch.

chat.initial_message: Welcome! I'm Victoria, your AI assistant. Ask me anything about the guesthouse or your London trip.
chat.session_load_error: Could not load chat session. Please return to the guidebook and try again.

error_page.missing_code_message: Your link is missing a booking code. Please use the exact link provided to you.
error_page.contact_message: Please ensure you are using the correct, most recent link. If you continue to have trouble, please contact us through your booking platform.
